      [ANGLE] Use-after-free in TextureD3D::releaseTexStorage<span class="line"><!---->[ANGLE] Use-after-free in TextureD3D::releaseTexStorage<!----></span><br><br>VULNERABILITY DETAILS<b class="line"><!---->VULNERABILITY DETAILS<!----></b><br>There is a use-after-free vulnerability that is caused by the TextureD3D::releaseTexStorage function.<span class="line"><!---->There is a use-after-free vulnerability that is caused by the TextureD3D::releaseTexStorage function.<!----></span><br><br>RenderTargetCache object caches the RenderTarget object for drawing.<span class="line"><!---->RenderTargetCache object caches the RenderTarget object for drawing.<!----></span><br>And a TextureD3D object has a TextureStorage object as a member, and a TextureStorage object has a RenderTarget as a member.<span class="line"><!---->And a TextureD3D object has a TextureStorage object as a member, and a TextureStorage object has a RenderTarget as a member.<!----></span><br><br>TextureD3D::releaseTexStorage function releases the TextureStorage member. At this time, the RenderTarget object is also released.<span class="line"><!---->TextureD3D::releaseTexStorage function releases the TextureStorage member. At this time, the RenderTarget object is also released.<!----></span><br>This RenderTarget object may be referenced by a RenderTargetCache object.<span class="line"><!---->This RenderTarget object may be referenced by a RenderTargetCache object.<!----></span><br>Therefore, the releaseTexStorage function must set the DirtyBit to update the RenderTargetCache object.<span class="line"><!---->Therefore, the releaseTexStorage function must set the DirtyBit to update the RenderTargetCache object.<!----></span><br><br>But it doesn't exist in current code like this:<span class="line"><!---->But it doesn't exist in current code like this:<!----></span><br>-------------------------<b class="line"><!---->-------------------------<!----></b>--------------------------------------------------------------<span class="line"><!---->--------------------------------------------------------------<!----></span><br>angle::Result TextureD3D::releaseTexStorage(const gl::Context *context)<span class="line"><!---->angle::Result TextureD3D::releaseTexStorage(const gl::Context *context)<!----></span><br>{<span class="line"><!---->{<!----></span><br>    if (!mTexStorage)<span class="line"><!---->    if (!mTexStorage)<!----></span><br>    {<span class="line"><!---->    {<!----></span><br>        return angle::Result::Continue;<span class="line"><!---->        return angle::Result::Continue;<!----></span><br>    }<span class="line"><!---->    }<!----></span><br><br>    auto err = mTexStorage->onDestroy(context);<span class="line"><!---->    auto err = mTexStorage-&gt;onDestroy(context);<!----></span><br>    SafeDelete(mTexStorage);<span class="line"><!---->    SafeDelete(mTexStorage);<!----></span><br>    return err;<span class="line"><!---->    return err;<!----></span><br>}<span class="line"><!---->}<!----></span><br>-------------------------<b class="line"><!---->-------------------------<!----></b>--------------------------------------------------------------<span class="line"><!---->--------------------------------------------------------------<!----></span><br><br><br>So the following code will get a pointer to a RenderTarget object that has already been freed.<span class="line"><!---->So the following code will get a pointer to a RenderTarget object that has already been freed.<!----></span><br>-------------------------<b class="line"><!---->-------------------------<!----></b>--------------------------------------------------------------<span class="line"><!---->--------------------------------------------------------------<!----></span><br>RenderTarget11 *Framebuffer11::getFirstRenderTarget() const<span class="line"><!---->RenderTarget11 *Framebuffer11::getFirstRenderTarget() const<!----></span><br>{<span class="line"><!---->{<!----></span><br>    for (auto *renderTarget : mRenderTargetCache.getColors())<span class="line"><!---->    for (auto *renderTarget : mRenderTargetCache.getColors())<!----></span><br>    {<span class="line"><!---->    {<!----></span><br>        if (renderTarget)<span class="line"><!---->        if (renderTarget)<!----></span><br>        {<span class="line"><!---->        {<!----></span><br>            return renderTarget;<span class="line"><!---->            return renderTarget;<!----></span><br>        }<span class="line"><!---->        }<!----></span><br>    }<span class="line"><!---->    }<!----></span><br><br>    return mRenderTargetCache.getDepthStencil();<span class="line"><!---->    return mRenderTargetCache.getDepthStencil();<!----></span><br>}<span class="line"><!---->}<!----></span><br>-------------------------<b class="line"><!---->-------------------------<!----></b>--------------------------------------------------------------<span class="line"><!---->--------------------------------------------------------------<!----></span><br><br><br>The attached PoC reallocates the Buffer to the freed RenderTarget object memory.<span class="line"><!---->The attached PoC reallocates the Buffer to the freed RenderTarget object memory.<!----></span><br>The debugger outputs the following exception:<span class="line"><!---->The debugger outputs the following exception:<!----></span><br>-------------------------<b class="line"><!---->-------------------------<!----></b>--------------------------------------------------------------<span class="line"><!---->--------------------------------------------------------------<!----></span><br>libglesv2!rx::StateManager11::updateState+0x101:<span class="line"><!---->libglesv2!rx::StateManager11::updateState+0x101:<!----></span><br>00007ffb`bce69071 ff5228          call    qword ptr [rdx+28h] ds:77777777`7777779f=????????????????<span class="line"><!---->00007ffb`bce69071 ff5228          call    qword ptr [rdx+28h] ds:77777777`7777779f=????????????????<!----></span><br>0:000> !heap -p -a @rax<span class="line"><!---->0:000&gt; !heap -p -a @rax<!----></span><br>    address 00000170ed18b1b0 found in<span class="line"><!---->    address 00000170ed18b1b0 found in<!----></span><br>    _HEAP @ 170ea7e0000<span class="line"><!---->    _HEAP @ 170ea7e0000<!----></span><br>              HEAP_ENTRY Size Prev Flags            UserPtr UserSize - state<span class="line"><!---->              HEAP_ENTRY Size Prev Flags            UserPtr UserSize - state<!----></span><br>        00000170ed18b180 000e 0000  [00]   00000170ed18b1b0    000b0 - (busy)<span class="line"><!---->        00000170ed18b180 000e 0000  [00]   00000170ed18b1b0    000b0 - (busy)<!----></span><br>          unknown!printable<span class="line"><!---->          unknown!printable<!----></span><br>        7ffbf3a5b49d ntdll!RtlpAllocateHeapInternal+0x0000000000000a7d<span class="line"><!---->        7ffbf3a5b49d ntdll!RtlpAllocateHeapInternal+0x0000000000000a7d<!----></span><br>        7ffbbd0e8eac        7ffbbcc27411 libglesv2!gl::Buffer::bufferDataImpl+0x0000000000000111<!----></span><br>        7ffbbcc274f3 libglesv2!gl::Buffer::bufferData+0x0000000000000023<span class="line"><!---->        7ffbbcc274f3 libglesv2!gl::Buffer::bufferData+0x0000000000000023<!----></span><br>        7ffbbcc4bc76 libglesv2!gl::Context::bufferData+0x0000000000000046<span class="line"><!---->        7ffbbcc4bc76 libglesv2!gl::Context::bufferData+0x0000000000000046<!----></span><br>        7ffbbcbd2d44 libglesv2!GL_BufferData+0x00000000000000b4<span class="line"><!---->        7ffbbcbd2d44 libglesv2!GL_BufferData+0x00000000000000b4<!----></span><br>-------------------------<b class="line"><!---->-------------------------<!----></b>--------------------------------------------------------------<span class="line"><!---->--------------------------------------------------------------<!----></span><br><br><br><br><br><br>VERSION<b class="line"><!---->VERSION<!----></b><br>Chrome Version: master (and tested on 92.0.4515.107 (Official Build) (64-bit) Stable)<span class="line"><!---->Chrome Version: master (and tested on 92.0.4515.107 (Official Build) (64-bit) Stable)<!----></span><br>Operating System: Windows 10 x64<span class="line"><!---->Operating System: Windows 10 x64<!----></span><br><br><br><br><br><br>REPRODUCTION CASE<b class="line"><!---->REPRODUCTION CASE<!----></b><br>Run the attached poc.html<span class="line"><!---->Run the attached poc.html<!----></span><br><br><br><br><br><br>FOR CRASHES, PLEASE INCLUDE THE FOLLOWING ADDITIONAL INFORMATION<b class="line"><!---->FOR CRASHES, PLEASE INCLUDE THE FOLLOWING ADDITIONAL INFORMATION<!----></b><br>Type of crash: GPU Process<span class="line"><!---->Type of crash: GPU Process<!----></span><br>Crash State:<span class="line"><!---->Crash State:<!----></span><br>=================================================================<span class="line"><!---->=================================================================<!----></span><br>==9072==ERROR: AddressSanitizer: heap-use-after-free on address 0x11a8c1a56be0 at pc 0x7ffb79542db0 bp 0x0088c7dfe680 sp 0x0088c7dfe6c8<span class="line"><!---->==9072==ERROR: AddressSanitizer: heap-use-after-free on address 0x11a8c1a56be0 at pc 0x7ffb79542db0 bp 0x0088c7dfe680 sp 0x0088c7dfe6c8<!----></span><br>READ of size 8 at 0x11a8c1a56be0 thread T0<span class="line"><!---->READ of size 8 at 0x11a8c1a56be0 thread T0<!----></span><br>==9072==WARNING: Failed to use and restart external symbolizer!<span class="line"><!---->==9072==WARNING: Failed to use and restart external symbolizer!<!----></span><br>==9072==*** WARNING: Failed to initialize DbgHelp!              ***<span class="line"><!---->==9072==*** WARNING: Failed to initialize DbgHelp!              ***<!----></span><br>==9072==*** Most likely this means that the app is already      ***<span href="https://autoroll.skia.org/r/angle-chromium-autoroll"><!---->https://autoroll.skia.org/r/angle-chromium-autoroll<!----></a><br>Please CC <span class="line"><!---->Please CC <!----></span>ynovikov@google.com<a class="undefined" target="_blank" href="/u/ynovikov@google.com"><!---->ynovikov@google.com<!----></a> on the revert to ensure that a human<span class="line"><!----> on the revert to ensure that a human<!----></span><br>is aware of the problem.<span class="line"><!---->is aware of the problem.<!----></span><br><br>To file a bug in ANGLE: <span         *** Boilerplate reminders! ***<span class="line"><!---->*** Boilerplate reminders! ***<!----></span><br>Please do NOT publicly disclose details until a fix has been released to all our users. Early public disclosure may cancel the provisional reward. Also, please be considerate about disclosure when the bug affects a core library that may be used by other products. Please do NOT share this information with third parties who are not directly involved in fixing the bug. Doing so may cancel the provisional reward. Please be honest if you have already disclosed anything publicly or to third parties. Lastly, we understand that some of you are not interested in money. We offer the option to donate your reward to an eligible charity. If you prefer this option, let us know and we will also match your donation - subject to our discretion. Any rewards that are unclaimed after 12 months will be donated to a charity of our choosing.<span class="line"><!---->Please do NOT publicly disclose details until a fix has been released to all our users. Early public disclosure may cancel the provisional reward. Also, please be considerate about disclosure when the bug affects a core library that may be used by other products. Please do NOT share this information with third parties who are not directly involved in fixing the bug. Doing so may cancel the provisional reward. Please be honest if you have already disclosed anything publicly or to third parties. Lastly, we understand that some of you are not interested in money. We offer the option to donate your reward to an eligible charity. If you prefer this option, let us know and we will also match your donation - subject to our discretion. Any rewards that are unclaimed after 12 months will be donated to a charity of our choosing.<!----></span><br><br>Please contact <span class="line"><!---->Please contact <!----></span>security-vrp@chromium.org<a class="undefined" target="_blank" href="mailto:security-vrp@chromium.org"><!---->security-vrp@chromium.org<!----></a> with any questions.<span class="line"><!----> with any questions.<!----></span><br>******************************<span class="line"><!---->******************************<!----></span><mr-comment-content></mr-comment-content>

        Description #1 by ggabu...@gmail.com (Jul 30, 2021)
      <option value="0" selected="">
        Description #1 by ggabu...@gmail.com (Jul 30, 2021)
      </option>
    
        <select aria-label="Description history menu" hidden="">
          <!---->
      <option value="0" selected="">

      <div class="select-container">

      </div>
      [ANGLE] Use-after-free in TextureD3D::releaseTexStorage<span class="line"><!---->[ANGLE] Use-after-free in TextureD3D::releaseTexStorage<!----></span><br><br>VULNERABILITY DETAILS<b class="line"><!---->VULNERABILITY DETAILS<!----></b><br>There is a use-after-free vulnerability that is caused by the TextureD3D::releaseTexStorage function.<span class="line"><!---->There is a use-after-free vulnerability that is caused by the TextureD3D::releaseTexStorage function.<!----></span><br><br>RenderTargetCache object caches the RenderTarget object for drawing.<span class="line"><!---->RenderTargetCache object caches the RenderTarget object for drawing.<!----></span><br>And a TextureD3D object has a TextureStorage object as a member, and a TextureStorage object has a RenderTarget as a member.<span class="line"><!---->And a TextureD3D object has a TextureStorage object as a member, and a TextureStorage object has a RenderTarget as a member.<!----></span><br><br>TextureD3D::releaseTexStorage function releases the TextureStorage member. At this time, the RenderTarget object is also released.<span class="line"><!---->TextureD3D::releaseTexStorage function releases the TextureStorage member. At this time, the RenderTarget object is also released.<!----></span><br>This RenderTarget object may be referenced by a RenderTargetCache object.<span class="line"><!---->This RenderTarget object may be referenced by a RenderTargetCache object.<!----></span><br>Therefore, the releaseTexStorage function must set the DirtyBit to update the RenderTargetCache object.<span class="line"><!---->Therefore, the releaseTexStorage function must set the DirtyBit to update the RenderTargetCache object.<!----></span><br><br>But it doesn't exist in current code like this:<span class="line"><!---->But it doesn't exist in current code like this:<!----></span><br>-------------------------<b class="line"><!---->-------------------------<!----></b>--------------------------------------------------------------<span class="line"><!---->--------------------------------------------------------------<!----></span><br>angle::Result TextureD3D::releaseTexStorage(const gl::Context *context)<span class="line"><!---->angle::Result TextureD3D::releaseTexStorage(const gl::Context *context)<!----></span><br>{<span class="line"><!---->{<!----></span><br>    if (!mTexStorage)<span class="line"><!---->    if (!mTexStorage)<!----></span><br>    {<span class="line"><!---->    {<!----></span><br>        return angle::Result::Continue;<span class="line"><!---->        return angle::Result::Continue;<!----></span><br>    }<span class="line"><!---->    }<!----></span><br><br>    auto err = mTexStorage->onDestroy(context);<span class="line"><!---->    auto err = mTexStorage-&gt;onDestroy(context);<!----></span><br>    SafeDelete(mTexStorage);<span class="line"><!---->    SafeDelete(mTexStorage);<!----></span><br>    return err;<span class="line"><!---->    return err;<!----></span><br>}<span class="line"><!---->}<!----></span><br>-------------------------<b class="line"><!---->-------------------------<!----></b>--------------------------------------------------------------<span class="line"><!---->--------------------------------------------------------------<!----></span><br><br><br>So the following code will get a pointer to a RenderTarget object that has already been freed.<span class="line"><!---->So the following code will get a pointer to a RenderTarget object that has already been freed.<!----></span><br>-------------------------<b class="line"><!---->-------------------------<!----></b>--------------------------------------------------------------<span class="line"><!---->--------------------------------------------------------------<!----></span><br>RenderTarget11 *Framebuffer11::getFirstRenderTarget() const<span class="line"><!---->RenderTarget11 *Framebuffer11::getFirstRenderTarget() const<!----></span><br>{<span class="line"><!---->{<!----></span><br>    for (auto *renderTarget : mRenderTargetCache.getColors())<span class="line"><!---->    for (auto *renderTarget : mRenderTargetCache.getColors())<!----></span><br>    {<span class="line"><!---->    {<!----></span><br>        if (renderTarget)<span class="line"><!---->        if (renderTarget)<!----></span><br>        {<span class="line"><!---->        {<!----></span><br>            return renderTarget;<span class="line"><!---->            return renderTarget;<!----></span><br>        }<span class="line"><!---->        }<!----></span><br>    }<span class="line"><!---->    }<!----></span><br><br>    return mRenderTargetCache.getDepthStencil();<span class="line"><!---->    return mRenderTargetCache.getDepthStencil();<!----></span><br>}<span class="line"><!---->}<!----></span><br>-------------------------<b class="line"><!---->-------------------------<!----></b>--------------------------------------------------------------<span class="line"><!---->--------------------------------------------------------------<!----></span><br><br><br>The attached PoC reallocates the Buffer to the freed RenderTarget object memory.<span class="line"><!---->The attached PoC reallocates the Buffer to the freed RenderTarget object memory.<!----></span><br>The debugger outputs the following exception:<span class="line"><!---->The debugger outputs the following exception:<!----></span><br>-------------------------<b ca<span class="line"><!---->  Left alloca redzone:     ca<!----></span><br>  Right alloca redzone:    cb<span class="line"><!---->  Right alloca redzone:    cb<!----></span><br>==9072==ABORTING<span class="line"><!---->==9072==ABORTING<!----></span><br>[3968:3752:0731/003258.174:ERROR:gpu_process_host.cc(951)] GPU process exited unexpectedly: exit_code=1<span class="line"><!---->[3968:3752:0731/003258.174:ERROR:gpu_process_host.cc(951)] GPU process exited unexpectedly: exit_code=1<!----></span><br><br><br><br><br><br>CREDIT INFORMATION<b         This bug requires manual review: DEPS changes referenced in bugdroid comments.<span class="line"><!---->This bug requires manual review: DEPS changes referenced in bugdroid comments.<!----></span><br>Before a merge request will be considered, the following information is required to be added to this bug:<span class="line"><!---->Before a merge request will be considered, the following information is required to be added to this bug:<!----></span><br><br>1. Does your merge fit within the Merge Decision Guidelines?<span class="line"><!---->1. Does your merge fit within the Merge Decision Guidelines?<!----></span><br>- Chrome: <span class="line"><!---->- Chrome: <!----></span>https://chromium.googlesource.com/chromium/src.git/+/main/docs/process/merge_request.md#when-to-request-a-merge<a class="undefined" target="_blank" href="https://chromium.googlesource.com/chromium/src.git/+/main/docs/process/merge_request.md#when-to-request-a-merge"><!---->https://chromium.googlesource.com/chromium/src.git/+/main/docs/process/merge_request.md#when-to-request-a-merge<!----></a><br>- Chrome OS: <span class="line"><!---->- Chrome OS: <!----></span>https://goto.google.com/cros-release-branch-merge-guidelines<a class="undefined" target="_blank" href="https://goto.google.com/cros-release-branch-merge-guidelines"><!---->https://goto.google.com/cros-release-branch-merge-guidelines<!----></a><br>2. Links to the CLs you are requesting to merge.<span class="line"><!---->2. Links to the CLs you are requesting to merge.<!----></span><br>3. Has the change landed and been verified on ToT?<span class="line"><!---->3. Has the change landed and been verified on ToT?<!----></span><br>4. Does this change need to be merged into other active release branches (M-1, M+1)?<span class="line"><!---->4. Does this change need to be merged into other active release branches (M-1, M+1)?<!----></span><br>5. Why are these changes required in this milestone after branch?<span class="line"><!---->5. Why are these changes required in this milestone after branch?<!----></span><br>6. Is this a new feature?<span class="line"><!---->6. Is this a new feature?<!----></span><br>7. If it is a new feature, is it behind a flag using finch?<span class="line"><!---->7.         *** Boilerplate reminders! ***<span class="line"><!---->*** Boilerplate reminders! ***<!----></span><br>Please do NOT publicly disclose details until a fix has been released to all our users. Early public disclosure may cancel the provisional reward. Also, please be considerate about disclosure when the bug affects a core library that may be used by other products. Please do NOT share this information with third parties who are not directly involved in fixing the bug. Doing so may cancel the provisional reward. Please be honest if you have already disclosed anything publicly or to third parties. Lastly, we understand that some of you are not interested in money. We offer the option to donate your reward to an eligible charity. If you prefer this option, let us know and we will also match your donation - subject to our discretion. Any rewards that are unclaimed after 12 months will be donated to a charity of our choosing.<span class="line"><!---->Please do NOT publicly disclose details until a fix has been released to all our users. Early public disclosure may cancel the provisional reward. Also, please be considerate about disclosure when the bug affects a core library that may be used by other products. Please do NOT share this information with third parties who are not directly involved in fixing the bug. Doing so may cancel the provisional reward. Please be honest if you have already disclosed anything publicly or to third parties. Lastly, we understand that some of you are not interested in money. We offer the option to donate your reward to an eligible charity. If you prefer this option, let us know and we will also match your donation - subject to our discretion. Any rewards that are unclaimed after 12 months will be donated to a charity of our choosing.<!----></span><br><br>Please contact <span class="line"><!---->Please contact <!----></span>security-vrp@chromium.org<a class="undefined" target="_blank" href="mailto:security-vrp@chromium.org"><!---->security-vrp@chromium.org<!----></a> with any questions.<span class="line"><!----> with any questions.<!----></span><br>******************************<span class="line"><!---->******************************<!----></span><mr-comment-content></mr-comment-content>

      [ANGLE] Use-after-free in TextureD3D::releaseTexStorage<span class="line"><!---->[ANGLE] Use-after-free in TextureD3D::releaseTexStorage<!----></span><br><br>VULNERABILITY DETAILS<b class="line"><!---->VULNERABILITY DETAILS<!----></b><br>There is a use-after-free vulnerability that is caused by the TextureD3D::releaseTexStorage function.<span class="line"><!---->There is a use-after-free vulnerability that is caused by the TextureD3D::releaseTexStorage function.<!----></span><br><br>RenderTargetCache object caches the RenderTarget object for drawing.<span class="line"><!---->RenderTargetCache object caches the RenderTarget object for drawing.<!----></span><br>And a TextureD3D object has a TextureStorage object as a member, and a TextureStorage object has a RenderTarget as a member.<span class="line"><!---->And a TextureD3D object has a TextureStorage object as a member, and a TextureStorage object has a RenderTarget as a member.<!----></span><br><br>TextureD3D::releaseTexStorage function releases the TextureStorage member. At this time, the RenderTarget object is also released.<span class="line"><!---->TextureD3D::releaseTexStorage function releases the TextureStorage member. At this time, the RenderTarget object is also released.<!----></span><br>This RenderTarget object may be referenced by a RenderTargetCache object.<span class="line"><!---->This RenderTarget object may be referenced by a RenderTargetCache object.<!----></span><br>Therefore, the releaseTexStorage function must set the DirtyBit to update the RenderTargetCache object.<span class="line"><!---->Therefore, the releaseTexStorage function must set the DirtyBit to update the RenderTargetCache object.<!----></span><br><br>But it doesn't exist in current code like this:<span class="line"><!---->But it doesn't exist in current code like this:<!----></span><br>-------------------------<b class="line"><!---->-------------------------<!----></b>--------------------------------------------------------------<span class="line"><!---->--------------------------------------------------------------<!----></span><br>angle::Result TextureD3D::releaseTexStorage(const gl::Context *context)<span class="line"><!---->angle::Result TextureD3D::releaseTexStorage(const gl::Context *context)<!----></span><br>{<span class="line"><!---->{<!----></span><br>    if (!mTexStorage)<span class="line"><!---->    if (!mTexStorage)<!----></span><br>    {<span class="line"><!---->    {<!----></span><br>        return angle::Result::Continue;<span class="line"><!---->        return angle::Result::Continue;<!----></span><br>    }<span class="line"><!---->    }<!----></span><br><br>    auto err = mTexStorage->onDestroy(context);<span class="line"><!---->    auto err = mTexStorage-&gt;onDestroy(context);<!----></span><br>    SafeDelete(mTexStorage);<span class="line"><!---->    SafeDelete(mTexStorage);<!----></span><br>    return err;<span class="line"><!---->    return err;<!----></span><br>}<span class="line"><!---->}<!----></span><br>-------------------------<b class="line"><!---->-------------------------<!----></b>--------------------------------------------------------------<span class="line"><!---->--------------------------------------------------------------<!----></span><br><br><br>So the following code will get a pointer to a RenderTarget object that has already been freed.<span class="line"><!---->So the following code will get a pointer to a RenderTarget object that has already been freed.<!----></span><br>-------------------------<b class="line"><!---->-------------------------<!----></b>--------------------------------------------------------------<span class="line"><!---->--------------------------------------------------------------<!----></span><br>RenderTarget11 *Framebuffer11::getFirstRenderTarget() const<span class="line"><!---->RenderTarget11 *Framebuffer11::getFirstRenderTarget() const<!----></span><br>{<span class="line"><!---->{<!----></span><br>    for (auto *renderTarget : mRenderTargetCache.getColors())<span class="line"><!---->    for (auto *renderTarget : mRenderTargetCache.getColors())<!----></span><br>    {<span class="line"><!---->    {<!----></span><br>        if (renderTarget)<span class="line"><!---->        if (renderTarget)<!----></span><br>        {<span class="line"><!---->        {<!----></span><br>            return renderTarget;<span class="line"><!---->            return renderTarget;<!----></span><br>        }<span class="line"><!---->        }<!----></span><br>    }<span class="line"><!---->    }<!----></span><br><br>    return mRenderTargetCache.getDepthStencil();<span class="line"><!---->    return mRenderTargetCache.getDepthStencil();<!----></span><br>}<span class="line"><!---->}<!----></span><br>-------------------------<b class="line"><!---->-------------------------<!----></b>--------------------------------------------------------------<span class="line"><!---->--------------------------------------------------------------<!----></span><br><br><br>The attached PoC reallocates the Buffer to the freed RenderTarget object memory.<span class="line"><!---->The attached PoC reallocates the Buffer to the freed RenderTarget object memory.<!----></span><br>The debugger outputs the following exception:<span class="line"><!---->The debugger outputs the following exception:<!----></span><br>-------------------------<b class="line"><!---->-------------------------<!----></b>--------------------------------------------------------------<span href="https://autoroll.skia.org/r/angle-chromium-autoroll"><!---->https://autoroll.skia.org/r/angle-chromium-autoroll<!----></a><br>Please CC <span class="line"><!---->Please CC <!----></span>ynovikov@google.com<a class="undefined" target="_blank" href="/u/ynovikov@google.com"><!---->ynovikov@google.com<!----></a> on the revert to ensure that a human<span class="line"><!----> on the revert to ensure that a human<!----></span><br>is aware of the problem.<span class="line"><!---->is aware of the problem.<!----></span><br><br>To file a bug in ANGLE: <span         *** Boilerplate reminders! ***<span class="line"><!---->*** Boilerplate reminders! ***<!----></span><br>Please do NOT publicly disclose details until a fix has been released to all our users. Early public disclosure may cancel the provisional reward. Also, please be considerate about disclosure when the bug affects a core library that may be used by other products. Please do NOT share this information with third parties who are not directly involved in fixing the bug. Doing so may cancel the provisional reward. Please be honest if you have already disclosed anything publicly or to third parties. Lastly, we understand that some of you are not interested in money. We offer the option to donate your reward to an eligible charity. If you prefer this option, let us know and we will also match your donation - subject to our discretion. Any rewards that are unclaimed after 12 months will be donated to a charity of our choosing.<span class="line"><!---->Please do NOT publicly disclose details until a fix has been released to all our users. Early public disclosure may cancel the provisional reward. Also, please be considerate about disclosure when the bug affects a core library that may be used by other products. Please do NOT share this information with third parties who are not directly involved in fixing the bug. Doing so may cancel the provisional reward. Please be honest if you have already disclosed anything publicly or to third parties. Lastly, we understand that some of you are not interested in money. We offer the option to donate your reward to an eligible charity. If you prefer this option, let us know and we will also match your donation - subject to our discretion. Any rewards that are unclaimed after 12 months will be donated to a charity of our choosing.<!----></span><br><br>Please contact <span class="line"><!---->Please contact <!----></span>security-vrp@chromium.org<a class="undefined" target="_blank" href="mailto:security-vrp@chromium.org"><!---->security-vrp@chromium.org<!----></a> with any questions.<span class="line"><!----> with any questions.<!----></span><br>******************************<span class="line"><!---->******************************<!----></span><mr-comment-content></mr-comment-content>

      </div><br>

      [ANGLE] Use-after-free in TextureD3D::releaseTexStorage<span class="line"><!---->[ANGLE] Use-after-free in TextureD3D::releaseTexStorage<!----></span><br><br>VULNERABILITY DETAILS<b class="line"><!---->VULNERABILITY DETAILS<!----></b><br>There is a use-after-free vulnerability that is caused by the TextureD3D::releaseTexStorage function.<span class="line"><!---->There is a use-after-free vulnerability that is caused by the TextureD3D::releaseTexStorage function.<!----></span><br><br>RenderTargetCache object caches the RenderTarget object for drawing.<span class="line"><!---->RenderTargetCache object caches the RenderTarget object for drawing.<!----></span><br>And a TextureD3D object has a TextureStorage object as a member, and a TextureStorage object has a RenderTarget as a member.<span class="line"><!---->And a TextureD3D object has a TextureStorage object as a member, and a TextureStorage object has a RenderTarget as a member.<!----></span><br><br>TextureD3D::releaseTexStorage function releases the TextureStorage member. At this time, the RenderTarget object is also released.<span class="line"><!---->TextureD3D::releaseTexStorage function releases the TextureStorage member. At this time, the RenderTarget object is also released.<!----></span><br>This RenderTarget object may be referenced by a RenderTargetCache object.<span class="line"><!---->This RenderTarget object may be referenced by a RenderTargetCache object.<!----></span><br>Therefore, the releaseTexStorage function must set the DirtyBit to update the RenderTargetCache object.<span class="line"><!---->Therefore, the releaseTexStorage function must set the DirtyBit to update the RenderTargetCache object.<!----></span><br><br>But it doesn't exist in current code like this:<span class="line"><!---->But it doesn't exist in current code like this:<!----></span><br>-------------------------<b class="line"><!---->-------------------------<!----></b>--------------------------------------------------------------<span class="line"><!---->--------------------------------------------------------------<!----></span><br>angle::Result TextureD3D::releaseTexStorage(const gl::Context *context)<span class="line"><!---->angle::Result TextureD3D::releaseTexStorage(const gl::Context *context)<!----></span><br>{<span class="line"><!---->{<!----></span><br>    if (!mTexStorage)<span class="line"><!---->    if (!mTexStorage)<!----></span><br>    {<span class="line"><!---->    {<!----></span><br>        return angle::Result::Continue;<span class="line"><!---->        return angle::Result::Continue;<!----></span><br>    }<span class="line"><!---->    }<!----></span><br><br>    auto err = mTexStorage->onDestroy(context);<span class="line"><!---->    auto err = mTexStorage-&gt;onDestroy(context);<!----></span><br>    SafeDelete(mTexStorage);<span class="line"><!---->    SafeDelete(mTexStorage);<!----></span><br>    return err;<span class="line"><!---->    return err;<!----></span><br>}<span class="line"><!---->}<!----></span><br>-------------------------<b class="line"><!---->-------------------------<!----></b>--------------------------------------------------------------<span class="line"><!---->--------------------------------------------------------------<!----></span><br><br><br>So the following code will get a pointer to a RenderTarget object that has already been freed.<span class="line"><!---->So the following code will get a pointer to a RenderTarget object that has already been freed.<!----></span><br>-------------------------<b class="line"><!---->-------------------------<!----></b>--------------------------------------------------------------<span class="line"><!---->--------------------------------------------------------------<!----></span><br>RenderTarget11 *Framebuffer11::getFirstRenderTarget() const<span class="line"><!---->RenderTarget11 *Framebuffer11::getFirstRenderTarget() const<!----></span><br>{<span class="line"><!---->{<!----></span><br>    for (auto *renderTarget : mRenderTargetCache.getColors())<span class="line"><!---->    for (auto *renderTarget : mRenderTargetCache.getColors())<!----></span><br>    {<span class="line"><!---->    {<!----></span><br>        if (renderTarget)<span class="line"><!---->        if (renderTarget)<!----></span><br>        {<span class="line"><!---->        {<!----></span><br>            return renderTarget;<span class="line"><!---->            return renderTarget;<!----></span><br>        }<span class="line"><!---->        }<!----></span><br>    }<span class="line"><!---->    }<!----></span><br><br>    return mRenderTargetCache.getDepthStencil();<span class="line"><!---->    return mRenderTargetCache.getDepthStencil();<!----></span><br>}<span class="line"><!---->}<!----></span><br>-------------------------<b class="line"><!---->-------------------------<!----></b>--------------------------------------------------------------<span class="line"><!---->--------------------------------------------------------------<!----></span><br><br><br>The attached PoC reallocates the Buffer to the freed RenderTarget object memory.<span class="line"><!---->The attached PoC reallocates the Buffer to the freed RenderTarget object memory.<!----></span><br>The debugger outputs the following exception:<span class="line"><!---->The debugger outputs the following exception:<!----></span><br>-------------------------<b         *** Boilerplate reminders! ***<span class="line"><!---->*** Boilerplate reminders! ***<!----></span><br>Please do NOT publicly disclose details until a fix has been released to all our users. Early public disclosure may cancel the provisional reward. Also, please be considerate about disclosure when the bug affects a core library that may be used by other products. Please do NOT share this information with third parties who are not directly involved in fixing the bug. Doing so may cancel the provisional reward. Please be honest if you have already disclosed anything publicly or to third parties. Lastly, we understand that some of you are not interested in money. We offer the option to donate your reward to an eligible charity. If you prefer this option, let us know and we will also match your donation - subject to our discretion. Any rewards that are unclaimed after 12 months will be donated to a charity of our choosing.<span class="line"><!---->Please do NOT publicly disclose details until a fix has been released to all our users. Early public disclosure may cancel the provisional reward. Also, please be considerate about disclosure when the bug affects a core library that may be used by other products. Please do NOT share this information with third parties who are not directly involved in fixing the bug. Doing so may cancel the provisional reward. Please be honest if you have already disclosed anything publicly or to third parties. Lastly, we understand that some of you are not interested in money. We offer the option to donate your reward to an eligible charity. If you prefer this option, let us know and we will also match your donation - subject to our discretion. Any rewards that are unclaimed after 12 months will be donated to a charity of our choosing.<!----></span><br><br>Please contact <span class="line"><!---->Please contact <!----></span>security-vrp@chromium.org<a class="undefined" target="_blank" href="mailto:security-vrp@chromium.org"><!---->security-vrp@chromium.org<!----></a> with any questions.<span class="line"><!----> with any questions.<!----></span><br>******************************<span class="line"><!---->******************************<!----></span><mr-comment-content></mr-comment-content>

           issue<h3 class="medium-heading"><!----> issue</h3>
          
            Target project:<label for="targetProjectInput">Target project:</label>
            
              <input id="targetProjectInput" aria-owns="chops-autocomplete-1" aria-autocomplete="both" aria-expanded="false" aria-haspopup="listbox" aria-activedescendant="">
              
      
        /*
         * Really specific class names are necessary because ShadowDOM
         * is disabled for this component.
         */
        .chops-autocomplete-container {
          position: relative;
        }
        .chops-autocomplete-container table {
          padding: 0;
          font-size: var(--chops-main-font-size);
          color: var(--chops-link-color);
          position: absolute;
          background: var(--chops-white);
          border: var(--chops-accessible-border);
          z-index: 999;
          box-shadow: 2px 3px 8px 0px hsla(0, 0%, 0%, 0.3);
          border-spacing: 0;
          border-collapse: collapse;
          /* In the case when the autocomplete extends the
           * height of the viewport, we want to make sure
           * there's spacing. */
          margin-bottom: 1em;
        }
        .chops-autocomplete-container tbody {
          display: block;
          min-width: 100px;
          max-height: 500px;
          overflow: auto;
        }
        .chops-autocomplete-container tr {
          cursor: pointer;
          transition: background 0.2s ease-in-out;
        }
        .chops-autocomplete-container tr[data-selected] {
          background: var(--chops-active-choice-bg);
          text-decoration: underline;
        }
        .chops-autocomplete-container td {
          padding: 0.25em 8px;
          white-space: nowrap;
        }
        .screenreader-hidden {
          clip: rect(1px, 1px, 1px, 1px);
          height: 1px;
          overflow: hidden;
          position: absolute;
          white-space: nowrap;
          width: 1px;
        }
      <style>
        /*
         * Really specific class names are necessary because ShadowDOM
         * is disabled for this component.
         */
        .chops-autocomplete-container {
          position: relative;
        }
        .chops-autocomplete-container table {
          padding: 0;
          font-size: var(--chops-main-font-size);
          color: var(--chops-link-color);
          position: absolute;
          background: var(--chops-white);
          border: var(--chops-accessible-border);
          z-index: 999;
          box-shadow: 2px 3px 8px 0px hsla(0, 0%, 0%, 0.3);
          border-spacing: 0;
          border-collapse: collapse;
          /* In the case when the autocomplete extends the
           * height of the viewport, we want to make sure
           * there's spacing. */
          margin-bottom: 1em;
        }
        .chops-autocomplete-container tbody {
          display: block;
          min-width: 100px;
          max-height: 500px;
          overflow: auto;
        }
        .chops-autocomplete-container tr {
          cursor: pointer;
          transition: background 0.2s ease-in-out;
        }
        .chops-autocomplete-container tr[data-selected] {
          background: var(--chops-active-choice-bg);
          text-decoration: underline;
        }
        .chops-autocomplete-container td {
          padding: 0.25em 8px;
          white-space: nowrap;
        }
        .screenreader-hidden {
          clip: rect(1px, 1px, 1px, 1px);
          height: 1px;
          overflow: hidden;
          position: absolute;
          white-space: nowrap;
          width: 1px;
        }
      </style>
      
        
          
        <span class="screenreader-hidden" aria-live="polite">
          
        </span>
        
          
            
          <tbody>
            
          </tbody>
        <table hidden="">
          <tbody>
            
          </tbody>
        </table>

            <i class="material-icons">close</i>
          </button>

 runOnLoad(function() {
 if (typeof(ClientLogger) === "function") {
 let cl = new ClientLogger("issues");
 if (cl.started("new-issue")) {
 cl.logEnd("new-issue", null, 120 * 1000);
 }
 if (cl.started("issue-search")) {
 cl.logEnd("issue-search");
 }
 }
 });
<script type="text/javascript" nonce="">
 runOnLoad(function() {
 if (typeof(ClientLogger) === "function") {
 let cl = new ClientLogger("issues");
 if (cl.started("new-issue")) {
 cl.logEnd("new-issue", null, 120 * 1000);
 }
 if (cl.started("issue-search")) {
 cl.logEnd("issue-search");
 }
 }
 });
</script>
